official_title: A bill to amend title 18 and 19 of the Social Security Act to require strict controls for the handling of patients' accounts, personal expense moneys and valuables.

summary.text: Requires that accurate records of the handling of accounts, personal expense moneys, and valuables of patients receiving benefits under the Medicare program of the Social Security Act be maintained; that a receipt be given and recorded for such items; and that they be kept separate from similar items owned by the facility caring for such patients.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 18 and 19 of the Social Security Act to require strict controls for the handling of patients' accounts, personal expense moneys and valuables.
